TERMS OF USE

The Terms of Use document consists of the list of main rules, which must be accepted by the user before installing and launching SaveInk. All the prescribed terms regulate the relationships between the owner of this application and the one, who intends to use it. By installing the product the user accepts all the statements and paragraphs from this text automatically.

Main terms:
  • This particular Terms of Use document may be updated by the owner of SaveInk at any moment. This doesn’t require prior notifying.
  • The owner doesn’t have to warn the user about the upcoming changes directly. The user is recommended renewing the web page on his own to be aware of any possible updates.
  • The user is strictly prohibited to copy the SaveInk application, modify the program or extract its source code. So long to the separate parts of the product. SaveInk is a unique application, so copying it leads to law disputes.
  • The application owner has a right to collect, store and use personal information supplied by the user or obtained from open sources. More about this term you can learn from the Privacy Policy document.
  • The owner doesn’t share the user’s personal data to third parties, which are not mentioned in Privacy Policy. Nevertheless, he has to give it after an official request from the competent authorities (for example, when the owner is ordered to do so by a court).
  • Only the user is fully responsible for his in-app actions. For example, the owner of the application isn’t responsible for the documents the user signs, their legitimacy, etc.
  • The service may be denied if the user commits violating actions, doesn’t follow the rules or cause any harm to the application or website.
  • The owner also reserves the right to complain to a competent authority to object the user’s actions and protect his property.
